definitions: an astringent liquid applied to the skin to reduce oiliness and improve its condition

examples.text: if your skin is oily, use a gentle toner
cleanse your face and take off any residue with toner

shortDefinitions: astringent liquid applied to skin to reduce oiliness and improve its condition

definitions: a device or exercise for making a specified part of the body firmer and stronger
shortDefinitions: device or exercise for making specified part of body

definitions: a black or colored powder used in xerographic copying processes

examples.text: a high-definition toner for color photocopying machines
the printer needs paper or toner

shortDefinitions: black or coloured powder used in xerographic copying processes

definitions: a chemical bath for changing the color or shade of a photographic print, especially as specified

notes.text: usually with adjective or noun modifier

shortDefinitions: chemical bath for changing colour or shade of photographic print
